items.sentence: Tom asked Mary who had been the first to arrive.
It looks like Tom has had a few too many drinks.

Tom and I were both at John and Mary\'s wedding.

I can\'t tell you what we did yesterday evening.

Nobody I know ever paid sticker price for a car.
Tom and Mary are both from Boston, aren\'t they?
I\'ll get the money from Tom one way or another.
I imagined my first kiss would be more romantic.
